name: hxDaedalus-simpledrawing
body: ![nmesimpledrawing](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/489459/8213460/e0bb6944-1519-11e5-9070-d00f1c173c37.png) # hxDaedalus-simpledrawing Simple drawing with hxDaedalus allows you to use simple draw commands the same way across a range of target structures. ( NME/Openfl, Flambe, Luxe, JS, SVG, Java Swing ). Requires: [hxDaedalus](https://github.com/Justinfront/hxDaedalus) On windows you can just run haxe compileAll.hxml and it will create a range of targets.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
